title: Document Lane C ControlEngine and Insurance Stubs
description: Document the architecture, interfaces, and usage of Lane C ControlEngine and all insurance stubs (PolicyGate, AllowedClaimsRegistry, PIIRedactor, FallbackPlanner, AuditTrail). Include configuration options and extension points.
acceptance_criteria: Documentation covers Lane C architecture and subcomponents
Usage examples for each insurance stub are included
Configuration and extension points are described
Documentation is accessible in the project docs
